content: smådrops 26-3 drops design pattern no me-021-bn yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- size 2 - 3/4 - 5/6 - 7/8 - 9/10 years all measurements in chart in cm conversion to inch - see page 4 materials drops merino extra fine from garnstudio 300-300-350-400-500 color no 30 mustard drops double pointed needles and circular needle 60 cm / 24 size 4 mm/us 6 - or size needed to get 21 sts x 28 row in stockinette st = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm a 3 = 52 sts measures 17 cm / 6 3/4 in width drops double pointed needles and circular needle 40 and 60 cm / 16 and 24 size 3 5 mm/us 4 - for rib
